messages.content: ComfyUI-extensions is a collection of extensions intended for use with ComfyUI.
To use ComfyUI-extensions, download any of the folders and place them in /web/extensions or a subdirectory of your ComfyUI installation.
How can you clone all ComfyUI-extensions at once?
You can clone all ComfyUI-extensions at once by running the command `git clone https://github.com/diffus3/ComfyUI-extensions ./web/extensions/diffus3` when in your ComfyUI directory.
Are ComfyUI-extensions polished and guaranteed to work?
No, ComfyUI-extensions are not polished, and some might even be outright broken.
